title: Passover apple cake
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '250ml vegetable oil', '200g caster sugar', '200g matzo meal', '70g potato starch', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '8 large apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
